title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
**Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition: The Ultimate GPS Outdoor Watch for Surfers**

Are you ready to take your surfing game to the next level? Look no further than the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition. This revolutionary GPS outdoor watch is designed specifically for surfers like you, with a range of features that will help you track and improve your performance in the water.

**Solar Charging Capabilities**

Say goodbye to dead batteries mid-session. The Instinct 2 Solar's solar charging capabilities mean you can keep tracking your waves without worrying about running out of power. With unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode and up to 48 hours in GPS mode, you'll be able to surf for as long as the sun shines.

**Surfing Features Galore**

The Instinct 2 Solar comes equipped with a range of surfing-specific features, including:

* Wave counter: Track your waves and keep an eye on your progress
* Maximum speed tracking: See how fast you're riding those gnarly waves
* Distance tracking: Measure the distance you've covered in the water
* Tide data: Stay ahead of the tides with real-time data

**Windsurfing and Kiteboarding**

But it's not just about surfing - the Instinct 2 Solar is also perfect for windsurfers and kiteboarders. With features like GPS position tracking, speed measurement, distance measurement, heart rate monitoring, and elevation data for jumps, you'll be able to track your performance in all conditions.

**Comprehensive Navigation**

The Instinct 2 Solar has got you covered whether you're surfing or not. With a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and satellite systems like GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo, you'll always know where you are and how to get back to shore.

**Health Monitoring**

And when you're not in the water, the Instinct 2 Solar still has your back. With features like heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox, and respiration tracking, you can stay on top of your overall health and wellness.

**Physical Specifications**

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar is built to last, with a fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass. It's also waterproof up to 100 meters, so you don't have to worry about it getting damaged in the water.

Don't miss out on this revolutionary GPS outdoor watch for surfers. Order your Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition today and take your surfing game to new heights!

**Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition: Your Ultimate Companion for Endless Adventures**

Are you ready to take your surfing and outdoor adventures to new heights? Look no further than the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch. This cutting-edge smartwatch is specifically designed for surfers and outdoor enthusiasts who demand more from their gear.

**Solar Charging Capabilities: Unlimited Power on the Go**

With solar charging capabilities, you can enjoy unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode and up to 48 hours of continuous use in GPS mode, all while harnessing the power of the sun. Whether you're riding waves or exploring new trails, this watch has got your back.

**Surfing Features: Track Every Wave**

The Surf-Edition is packed with features that cater specifically to surfers. Track every wave, including maximum speed, distance, and tide data, with ease. With wave counter, max speed tracking, and distance tracking, you'll never miss a moment of the action.

**Windsurfing Kiteboarding Features: Monitor Your Progress**

In addition to surfing features, this watch also offers windsurfing and kiteboarding capabilities. Track your GPS position, speed, distance, heart rate, and elevation data for jumps, giving you unparalleled insight into your performance.

**Navigation: Always Find Your Way**

With 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and satellite systems like GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo, this watch provides seamless navigation wherever your adventures take you.

**Health Monitoring: Stay on Top of Your Game**

Monitor your heart rate, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox, and respiration tracking to optimize your performance and stay healthy. With Garmin Pay, you can also make contactless payments on-the-go.

**Physical Specifications: Built for the Outdoors**

Built with fiber-reinforced polymer and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass, this watch is designed to withstand the rigors of outdoor adventure. Water-rated up to 100 meters, it's perfect for surfing, swimming, or any other water-based activity.

Don't miss out on the ultimate surfing companion. Get your Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition today and unlock a world of endless adventures!

**Unleash Your Inner Surfer with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition**

Are you ready to ride the waves and track your surfing adventures like never before? Look no further than the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch. This innovative device is designed specifically for surfers, windsurfers, and kiteboarders, providing unparalleled tracking capabilities and performance monitoring features.

**Solar Charging Capabilities**

With its solar charging capabilities, you'll never have to worry about running out of battery life again. The Instinct 2 Solar can be charged in just 3 hours a day in 50,000 lux sunlight, giving you unlimited smartwatch mode battery life and up to 48 hours of GPS tracking.

**Surfing Features**

Track your waves like a pro with the Instinct 2 Solar's surfing features:

* Wave counter: Keep track of your wave count and average wave height
* Maximum speed tracking: Monitor your top speeds and fastest runs
* Distance tracking: Track your total distance traveled and average speed
* Tide data: Stay informed about tides and plan your surf sessions accordingly

**Windsurfing & Kiteboarding Features**

The Instinct 2 Solar also supports windsurfing and kiteboarding with features like:

* GPS position tracking: Monitor your exact location on the water
* Speed tracking: Track your speed and average speed
* Distance tracking: Keep track of your total distance traveled
* Heart rate monitoring: Monitor your heart rate during intense sessions
* Elevation data for jumps: Get accurate elevation data to optimize your jumps

**Additional Features**

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition also includes:

* Smart notifications: Stay connected with friends and family while on the go
* Connect IQ: Customize your watch with apps and data fields
* Preloaded activity profiles: Track your running, biking, swimming, strength training, and more
* Health monitoring: Monitor your heart rate, sleep, Pulse Ox, and respiration

**Physical Specifications**

The Instinct 2 Solar features a rugged design with:

* Water rating: 100 meters
* Thermal resistance: Withstand extreme temperatures
* Shock resistance: Can withstand impacts and drops
* Case material: Fiber-reinforced polymer
* Glass type: Scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass

**Upgrade Your Surfing Experience**

Don't miss out on the ultimate surfing experience. Get your Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch today and take your surfing adventures to new heights!
